name: Raticate
description: Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop growing, so it gnaws to pare them down.

attacks.name: Razor-Sharp Incisors
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gnaw Up
attacks.effect: Discard a Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
